rows.name: Truth Set
rows.description: All truth set loci in VCF format.

rows.name: Truth Set BED
rows.description: All truth set loci in BED format.

rows.name: Filtered out INDELs
rows.description: These are InDels that are within SynDip high-confidence regions and didn't pass STR filters for reasons described in the VCF filter field.

rows.name: SynDip: high confidence regions BED
rows.description: High-confidence regions from [Li 2018] spanning 2.7 gigabases (90%) of hg38.

rows.name: SynDip: raw variants
rows.description: Truth data from [Li 2018], including variants both within and outside of the provided high-confidence regions.

rows.name: SynDip: high confidence variants
rows.description: Truth data from [Li 2018], excluding variants outside the SynDip high confidence regions.

rows.name: SynDip: high confidence INDELs
rows.description: Truth data from [Li 2018] filtered to all INDELs within high confidence regions.

rows.name: Illumina Catalog
rows.description: Catalog of 174k loci that are polymorphic in the 2,504 samples from the 1000 Genomes Project

rows.name: GangSTR v17 catalog
rows.description: The latest genome-wide STR catalog from the GangSTR github repo

rows.name: HipSTR catalog
rows.description: The latest genome-wide STR catalog from the HipSTR reference github repo

rows.name: Known Disease-Causing Loci
rows.description: TR loci known to be associated with Mendelian diseases

rows.name: New catalog: >= 9bp in hg38
rows.description: Catalog of 2.8 million pure repeat loci found in hg38 by running TandemRepeatFinder with very large (=1000000) mismatch and indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 9bp.

rows.name: New catalog: >= 12bp in hg38
rows.description: Catalog of 1.3 million pure repeat loci found in hg38 by running TandemRepeatFinder with very large (=1000000) mismatch and indel penalties followed by filtering to loci that span at least 12bp.

rows.name: 36-mer mappability
rows.description: Mappability of 36-mers allowing for 2 mismatches. Generated using the same pipeline as the UCSC hg19 mappability tracks.

rows.name: SegDups >1000 bases
rows.description: Duplications of >1000 Bases of Non-RepeatMasked Sequence downloaded from UCSC

rows.name: MANE v1
rows.description:
The Matched Annotation from NCBI and EMBL-EBI (MANE) project aims to produce a matched set of high-confidence transcripts that are identically annotated between RefSeq (NCBI) and Ensembl/GENCODE (led by EMBL-EBI). Transcripts for MANE are chosen by a combination of automated and manual methods based on conservation, expression levels, clinical significance, and other factors. Transcripts are matched between the NCBI RefSeq and Ensembl/GENCODE annotations based on the GRCh38 genome assembly, with precise 5' and 3' ends defined by high-throughput sequencing or other available data.

The current release (MANE v1.0) includes coverage of 99% of human protein-coding genes and 99.8% of genes of clinical relevance, including genes in the American College of Medical Genetics and Genomics (ACMG) Secondary Findings list (SF) v3.0. This release includes both MANE Select (19062) and MANE Plus Clinical (58) transcripts.

rows.name: Truth Set + homopolymers
rows.description: All truth set loci in VCF format, including homopolymers.

rows.name: Truth Set BED + homopolymers
rows.description: All truth set loci in BED format, including homopolymers.

rows.name: Filtered out INDELs + homopolymers
rows.description: These are InDels (including homopolymers) that are within SynDip high-confidence regions and didn't pass STR filters for reasons described in the VCF filter field.
